DOC.HEADLINE: RUSSIA ' S LATEST DIPHTHERIA OUTBREAK HITS VLADIVOSTOK
DOC.TEXT: Fifteen people have been killed by diphtheria in the Far Eastern port of Vladivostok , the latest Russian city hit by the epidemic . Physicians in Vladivostok blamed the outbreak on unsanitary conditions and the migration of people to and from the region , the ITAR-Tass news_agency said Friday . So far , 700 cases have been reported .
